j_cumps wrote:
> I've been testing JUnit 4 with Ant 1.7alpha(from svn).
> I used both JUnit (not in 3.8 compatible mode) and JUnitReport targets.
> It works fine.
>
> Is this the way forward for Ant integration?
> In this list, I read that you were thinking about separating the JUnit
> tasks from Ant.

As I understand it, Ant 1.7 will support JUnit 4, but it's not yet 
decided whether this support will live in Ant or JUnit, and how it will 
be maintained.  Discussions are ongoing--thanks for your interest!

    David
